select t.*,h.holderName "operatorName",ty.typeName from ZC_Goods t left join HolderData h on t.operator = h.holderNo left join ZC_GoodsType ty on t.type = ty.fid where 1=1
and CHARINDEX(#{type},t.type ) = 1
and t.goodsName like '%'+#{goodsName}+'%'
and t.goodsCode like '%'+#{goodsCode}+'%'
and t.model like '%'+#{model}+'%'
